content: Hey @pierwill -- btw I recently pushed up the refactoring that separates the formality code into a core "logic level" (which is totally Rust independent) and a "type level" (which is intended to encode Rust typing rules; it also defines the core predicates). It's possible that decl and ty could be merged, even, but I think the subtyping logic will eventually get complex enough that it'd be better to separate it out.
